io.micronaut.inject

Interface MethodReference<T,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type
    R - The result type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AnnotatedElement, AnnotationMetadata, AnnotationMetadataDelegate, AnnotationMetadataProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BeanDefinitionMethodReference<T,R>, DelegatingExecutableMethod<T,R>, ExecutableMethod<T,R>, MethodBasedRouteMatch<R>, MethodExecutionHandle<R>, MethodInvocationContext<T,R>, UriRouteMatch<R>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExecutableMethod, MethodInterceptorChain

    public interface MethodReference<T,R>
extends AnnotationMetadataDelegate
    A reference to a method.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
